title: How to Add Vectors - From Zero to Geo 1.3

media:group.media:title: How to Add Vectors - From Zero to Geo 1.3
media:group.media:description:
How can you add vectors?  In this video, we look at the addition of numbers to find a way to define addition for vectors.  We also explore how to find the negative of a vector and how to subtract vectors.

This video is a part of "From Zero to Geo", a series where we formulate geometric algebra, an incredibly powerful branch of mathematics, from the ground up.  Full playlist here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLVuwZXwFua-0Ks3rRS4tIkswgUmDLqqRy
Next video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNnUGAwqy14

Discord: https://discord.gg/3Zj59zA2Rg

Sections:
00:00 Introduction
00:36 Defining Addition

09:43 Conclusion
